teams.name: Kath & Ko
teams.loan_because: We are rich in so many ways and know that empowering others to improve their lives is a good way to share our good fortune.
teams.description:
We are a team of friends, and friends of friends with a common goal.
To provide resources for others less fortunate than ourselves to support them as they improve their lives and business'

teams.name: Bo - a celebration
teams.loan_because: Kiva allows those with little income or erratic income to give to those more disadvantage than themselves – and to give generously - by repeatedly re-distributing the original donation each month.
teams.description:
Those who ever met my much much adored 22-year-old Bo, could not fail to perceive a very considerate, kind generous soul. Despite his youth he had already been impressively proactive in helping disadvantaged people. Let’s continue in his vein.

Bo would have liked the idea of a Kiva team in his name, and he would have been touched.

teams.name: Iraqis (Arabs,Kurds,Turkmens, Christians and All)
teams.loan_because:
"I have never been especially impressed by the heroics of people who are convinced they are about to change the world. I am more awed by those who struggle to make one small difference after another."
Ellen Goodman
teams.description: We want to help by making a small change at a time.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Resurrection Saves
teams.loan_because: We are a community investing in our future by investing in the future of those with less.
teams.description: A caring Catholic community

teams.name: Memory Lending Squad
teams.loan_because: Why not?
teams.description: Diverse group from around the globe working together and having fun.

teams.name: Students of Coast Mountain Academy
teams.loan_because: we have rights, a home, safety, food, clean water, healthcare, passion and an abundance of opportunities.  We have the opportunity to change the cycle of poverty into a cycle of empowerment through micro finance... so why not?
teams.description: Students of Coast Mountain Academy is group of youths between the ages of 11 and 16 living in the Sea to Sky Corridor. We all attend a small independent liberal arts school focussed on experiential education and challenging academics.

teams.name: In Memory of Paul Lambert
teams.loan_because: We all want to remember Paul.
teams.description: Paul was a Volunteer Coordinator at Kiva.  He spoke four languages (English, French, Spanish and Russian).  He touched the lives of many through his work and the hearts of countless through his friendship.  We all miss him.

teams.name: Monterey Institute of International Studies
teams.description: Students from the Monterey Institute of International Studies pursue graduate degrees in Translation & Interpretation, International Business, International Policy Studies and Language and Educational Linguistics.

teams.name: Kiva Spanish Translators
teams.loan_because: We want to support Kiva entrepreneurs in every way we can.
teams.description: We are Kiva volunteer translators and friends who are inspired to support Kiva entrepreneurs with our translation skills and with loans.

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.loan_because: Kiva allows those with little income or erratic income to give to those more disadvantage than themselves – and to give generously - by repeatedly re-distributing the original donation each month.

teams.name: The Green Socialist: A Global Alliance for Freedom, Equality, and Earth Preservation
teams.loan_because: Promote equality, co-operation, freedom, and self-reliance.  Help the world's poorest elevate out of poverty.  Allow the loan recipients and NOT corporations to profit from their effort.  Help preserve our planet.
teams.description: Socialists, social democrats, Greens, Hippies, environmentalists, opponents of globalization, anti-capitalists, earth-friendly 'radicals', and other left-wingers turning ideas into action.  Individuals who consider freedom a fundamental human right, and realize that true freedom cannot exist without the equality of conditions.

teams.name: Team Permaculture
teams.loan_because: We want to reinvest our surpluses in eco-social regeneration!
teams.description: Mutually supportive functionally interconnected mycelial network of permaculture actionists.

teams.name: Green Partnerships
teams.loan_because: We want to help create more sustainable and equitable communities all around the world.
teams.description:
We lend to individuals and groups engaged in businesses and services that help them earn a living but also help to protect the environment in their part of the world. We also strive to build green partnerships in our own communities by supporting the women and men who provide businesses, services, and products that benefit people and the Earth. 

Some of our team members mainly fund green loans, while others choose to designate a fraction of their loans to green enterprises. These are examples of just some of the loans Green Partnerships has helped to fund:

teams.name: Your Inspiration At Home
teams.loan_because: Our Mission is to empower women globally in business and financial success.
teams.description: We are a team of business leaders in Your Inspiration at Home who aspire to help women experience financial independence globally.

teams.name: Clara's Team
teams.loan_because: We want to use our 6th grade community service project to help and to learn.
teams.description: A group of 6th grade students from Park City, Utah!

teams.name: Seventh-day Adventists
teams.loan_because:
Through humanitarian acts we make known the just, merciful and loving character of God.

To work with those in need is an expression of our love for God.

The compassionate ministry of Jesus is its own abundant motive and reward.
teams.description:
The SDA Church is a Christian denomination which is distinguished mainly by its observance of Saturday, the original seventh day of the Judeo-Christian week, as the Sabbath.

The world church is governed by a General Conference, with smaller regions administered by divisions, union conferences and local conferences. It currently has a worldwide membership of over 15 million people, has a missionary presence in over 200 countries and territories and is ethnically and culturally diverse. The church operates numerous schools, hospitals and publishing houses worldwide, as well as a prominent humanitarian aid organization known as the Adventist Development and Relief Agency (ADRA).

teams.name: Renfro Family Lending Team
teams.loan_because: We want to make a positive impact on the world and help others.  We have been blessed, and we want to give back to those in need.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Yokohama International School
teams.loan_because: We believe in empowering students and people across the globe to create change.
teams.description: A school-wide effort to raise awareness and support people in need through micro-financing.

teams.name: Ian Martin Group
teams.loan_because:
We see a world with each and every person pursuing meaningful work.

So in 2014, we are "Redeeming the Resume Black Hole" by asking all 100,000+ people who apply to jobs through the Ian Martin Group, to use our funds to make a loan on Kiva!

For more:
http://ianmartin.com/blog/2014/01/redeeming-the-resume-black-hole/

Check out our progress here: http://www.kiva.org/team/ianmartin/goals
teams.description:
Founded in 1957, the Ian Martin Group is North America's most progressive recruitment and project-staffing firm.  As a Certified B Corporation, we meet comprehensive standards that measure our impact on employees, suppliers, community, and the environment. Our guiding statement is: “building authentic connections around meaningful work.”
 
The Ian Martin family includes technical recruitment divisions IME, IMT and IMIT – experts in Engineering, Telecom and IT respectively. The 500 Staffing is best understood as 'not so’ General Staffing and Ian Martin Executive which focuses on providing exceptional business leadership to technical and scientific centered organizations. 

http://ianmartin.com
http://ianmartin.com/blog
https://twitter.com/IanMartinGroup
https://facebook.com/IanMartinGroup
http://bcorporation.net/ianmartingroup

teams.name: Green Hat Marketing
teams.loan_because: Kiva’s mission is to enable entrepreneurial spirit to succeed - regardless of the size of the idea. This is an ideology shared by small business across Australia. By donating to Kiva, Green Hat provides the opportunity to help another entrepreneur power up and achieve success regardless of their size.
teams.description: Green Hat is a B2B marketing consulting agency specialising in the high-tech, professional services and financial services sectors. Our client list includes global blue-chip brands such as IBM, EMC, Ernst & Young and Nokia Siemens, as well as many home-grown organisations. We help our clients with planning, designing, implementing and operating lifecycle marketing to their customers. We use advanced automated marketing processes for effective lead nurturing, customer retention, online engagement and content marketing - improving sales pipeline quality and revenue growth.

teams.name: milepoint
teams.loan_because: As travelers we have seen poverty first hand and are committed to making the world a better place for all.
teams.description: Travelers who collect miles and points and seek free flights, hotel rooms and upgrades where possible. Here we seek to give back and invite everyone to join with us and make a difference.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: DoSomething
teams.loan_because: DoSomething.org is the country’s largest not-for-profit for young people and social change. We have 1,666,208 members (and counting) who kick ass on causes they care about. Bullying. Animal cruelty. Homelessness. Cancer. The list goes on. DoSomething.org spearheads national campaigns so 13- to 25-year-olds can make an impact - without ever needing money, an adult, or a car. Over 2.4 million people took action through DoSomething.org in 2012. Why? Because apathy sucks.

teams.description: We are students at Western Michigan University taking an African Literature class. Through the literature we read, we've learned about the struggles of Africans living in poverty. teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

teams.name: HP
teams.loan_because:
This is a unique opportunity for HP employees globally to actively participate in driving HP Living Progress by supporting thousands of entrepreneurs around the world who need access to capital to start or grow their business. HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: Bo - a celebration
teams.loan_because: Kiva allows those with little income or erratic income to give to those more disadvantage than themselves – and to give generously - by repeatedly re-distributing the original donation each month.
teams.description:
Those who ever met my much much adored 22-year-old Bo, could not fail to perceive a very considerate, kind generous soul. Despite his youth he had already been impressively proactive in helping disadvantaged people. Let’s continue in his vein.

Bo would have liked the idea of a Kiva team in his name, and he would have been touched.

teams.name: Non Nobis Solum
teams.loan_because: The best of this explanation of our group comes from the meaning of the Latin phrase.  As Wikipedia explains, "The motto is derived from a sentence in Cicero's most influential philosophical work, his treatise On Duties (Latin: De Officiis). In full, Cicero writes, non nobis solum nati sumus ortusque nostri partem patria vindicat, partem amici ("Not for us alone are we born; our country, our friends, have a share in us"), Cicero, de officiis, 1:22. The sentence, as Cicero himself says, is a literal translation of a sentiment from Plato's Letter to Archytas.[1] In the context of the passage, the sentence means that "humans have been created for the sake of others of their kind, indeed, to benefit each other as much as possible".[2] Cicero associates this concept with the Stoic ideal of cosmopolitanism, according to which all men have a natural kinship with all other men and need to "contribute to the general good by an interchange of acts of kindness (officia), by giving and receiving"[3]"
teams.description: We are a group of educators, philanthropists, and believers in community service.  We work for those in our local community, but believe that the human community merits our attention.

teams.name: Dermalogica
teams.loan_because:
NEWS! In honor of International Women's Day, if you join our team, then make a loan and credit our team, we'll match your loan with one of our own!!*

We believe in the multiplier effect of supplying capital to women - supporting a woman in opening or growing a business enables her to buy food and housing for her family, send her children to school, and contribute to the welfare of her community.  We want to help put more women on the road to Financial Independence Through Entrepreneurship. Join the FITE!
* We'll match up to 3,000 loans.
teams.description: Dermalogica is the number one line of skin care products for professional skin therapists and consumers worldwide.

teams.name: Unitarian Flames
teams.loan_because: Micro banking is a perfect way for us to put our 7 principles into action!
teams.description:
Our 7 principles are:
1.We believe that each and every person is important.
2. We believe that all people should be treated fairly and kindly.
3. We believe that our churches are places where all people are accepted and where we keep on learning together.
4. We believe that each person must be free to search for what is true and right in life.
5. All people have the right to speak out and vote on things that matter to them.
6. We believe in working for a peaceful, fair and free world.  
7. We believe in caring for our planet Earth, the home we share with all living things

teams.name: Green Hat Marketing
teams.loan_because: Kiva’s mission is to enable entrepreneurial spirit to succeed - regardless of the size of the idea. This is an ideology shared by small business across Australia. By donating to Kiva, Green Hat provides the opportunity to help another entrepreneur power up and achieve success regardless of their size.
teams.description: Green Hat is a B2B marketing consulting agency specialising in the high-tech, professional services and financial services sectors. Our client list includes global blue-chip brands such as IBM, EMC, Ernst & Young and Nokia Siemens, as well as many home-grown organisations. We help our clients with planning, designing, implementing and operating lifecycle marketing to their customers. We use advanced automated marketing processes for effective lead nurturing, customer retention, online engagement and content marketing - improving sales pipeline quality and revenue growth.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

***TEAM RESOURCES***

http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

Field Partners - Social and Secular Ratings:
www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142

Fund the next Loan: DNdYJg4wGxtCTgPpXd3e3iQxuiKcjh9rtF
teams.description: Donating for the well-being of the global community. To preserve and promote the crypto-ways using DGB!

teams.name: Bo - a celebration
teams.loan_because: Kiva allows those with little income or erratic income to give to those more disadvantage than themselves – and to give generously - by repeatedly re-distributing the original donation each month.
teams.description:
Those who ever met my much much adored 22-year-old Bo, could not fail to perceive a very considerate, kind generous soul. Despite his youth he had already been impressively proactive in helping disadvantaged people. Let’s continue in his vein.

Bo would have liked the idea of a Kiva team in his name, and he would have been touched.

teams.name: The Cherry Blossoms
teams.loan_because: We want to contribute to the entrepreneurial efforts of women in other countries.
teams.description: We are a group of friends, and friends of friends, in Washington, DC and afar. The team was created one night during Snowmaggedon 2010 and enthusiastically welcomes new friends into this circle of inspirational lending.

teams.name: Kath & Ko
teams.loan_because: We are rich in so many ways and know that empowering others to improve their lives is a good way to share our good fortune.
teams.description:
We are a team of friends, and friends of friends with a common goal.
To provide resources for others less fortunate than ourselves to support them as they improve their lives and business'

teams.name: HRDQ
teams.loan_because: Our goal is to help individuals, teams, and organizations improve their lives through better work performance, and Kiva is an extension of that goal to small business owners in less fortunate countries around the world.
teams.description: Our team includes HRDQ employees, family and friends. Anyone who would like to join our team is welcome.

teams.name: Dermalogica
teams.loan_because:
NEWS! In honor of International Women's Day, if you join our team, then make a loan and credit our team, we'll match your loan with one of our own!!*

We believe in the multiplier effect of supplying capital to women - supporting a woman in opening or growing a business enables her to buy food and housing for her family, send her children to school, and contribute to the welfare of her community.  We want to help put more women on the road to Financial Independence Through Entrepreneurship. Join the FITE!
* We'll match up to 3,000 loans.
teams.description: Dermalogica is the number one line of skin care products for professional skin therapists and consumers worldwide.

teams.name: women empowering women
teams.loan_because: empower a woman, change the world.

teams.name: University of Missouri
teams.loan_because: Tigers care!
teams.description: We are the true sons and daughters of the University of Missouri, and we know that we can make a difference. Mizzou is a school rich with tradition and support, and we want to spread that out into the world.

teams.name: Dermalogica

We want to help put more women on the road to Financial Independence Through Entrepreneurship. Join the FITE!

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: HP
teams.loan_because:
This is a unique opportunity for HP employees globally to actively participate in driving HP Living Progress by supporting thousands of entrepreneurs around the world who need access to capital to start or grow their business. HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: Green Chile Gals
teams.loan_because: Jesus Christ teaches us hospitality and generosity, to love our neighbors as ourselves.
teams.description: This online fellowship is growing out of our dinner fellowship, which meets monthly Monday nights.  We are members of First Presbyterian Church in Tucumcari, New Mexico, USA.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

***TEAM RESOURCES***
Secular Loans
http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

Field Partners - Social and Secular Ratings:
www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

***OTHER RESOURCES:***
Starfish List:
http://starfish.dynalias.org/

KivaLens:
http://www.kivalens.org/

teams.name: Team USA
teams.loan_because: We believe in the generosity of the human spirit that is still alive within Americans of all backgrounds.

teams.name: Friends of Fundación Mujer
teams.loan_because: We admire the enthusiasm and dedication Fundación Mujer demonstrates in its work with entreprenuers in Costa Rica. Learn more about Fundación Mujer here: http://www.kiva.org/about/aboutPartner?id=151
teams.description: We are dedicated to supporting Fundación Mujer and its mission of contributing to the development of women by promoting their productive, organizational, and social activities as a way of improving their lives and the lives of their families.

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.
